
```{r}

# Sample data frame with missing values
data <- data.frame(
  Name   = c("Alice", "Bob", "Charlie", NA, "Eve"),
  Age    = c(25, NA, 30, 28, NA),
  Score  = c(90, 85, NA, 88, 92)
)

data


```

```{r}
# Using is.na() - Identify missing values (TRUE where NA exists)
is.na(data)



```


```{r}
# Count missing values per column
colSums(is.na(data))


```

```{r}
# Using summary() - Quick overview of the dataset
summary(data)


```

```{r}
# Using complete.cases() - Find rows without missing values
complete.cases(data)


```

```{r}
# Keep only complete rows (remove any row with NA)
clean_data <- data[complete.cases(data), ]
clean_data
```
